tool_description: An API showing all the latest MMA News around the world
name: MMA News
title: MMA News

api_list.name: Get All MMA News
api_list.description: This  endpoint will return all news about MMA from all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mma-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/mmamania"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mma-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mma-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mma-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
